channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @TheRaDR @datadivajf @HIASrefugees I wrote about last year’s model.
@evendrones @AllredMD @Manruss Trying to figure out: If a must-buy artist collaborates with a must-buy writer, must I buy two copies?
@harrymwood And I appreciate that.
@ChemiShalev On the other hand, they’re now buying weapons from Israel. Which is kind of amazing to those of us who know the role Czech weapons played in the early days of Israel.
@NickTagliaferro Other than the trademark issues, would a Vulcan-ear-shaped edible be kosher?
@ryanlcooper Brooks family values. It’s in her name.
@lavietidhar Pulped fiction!
@lavietidhar Serves you right for abandoning important historical events like the Uganda Plan for obscure medieval myths.

@rmneiss Our local federation is on board with the OU. Which accepts Schecters as well as Catholic and Muslim schools under its lobbying umbrella.
@rmneiss But here the OU is leading the way. Of course, the budgets of Bergen County day schools dwarf the federation budget.
@rmneiss I expect the Supreme Court will legalize direct funding of parochial schools shortly. As it is, the OU is boasting of a billion dollars in state aid to Jewish schools in the past decade.
@jamesdnicoll Nothing made of protons is permanent.
@jamesdnicoll Have you heard the good news about proton decay?

@PetreRaleigh @RottenInDenmark @deonteleologist I mean, here we have them recruiting a slaveholder to defend the U. S. from charges of racism. George Washington had his virtues, but non-racism wasn’t one of them. https://t.co/2nojuwEK73

@AkivaMCohen Probably less offensive than their whitewashing of Christopher Columbus. Say what you want about Washington — and even Jefferson — but they didn’t murder children and feed them to their parents.
@AkivaMCohen The idea that a Jew would whitewash a man so hideous that Ferdinand and Isabella found him sanctionably cruel to heathens is mind boggling.

Shortly before Moetzes Gedolei Torah realized that ploughing through the Talmud every seven years was ultimately a cheaper distraction than feeding their crossword puzzle addiction. https://t.co/5ekxGLNjzW

@RottenInDenmark @deonteleologist But he accepts the Republican idea that “racism” is only explicit racial discrimination or *false* judgements based on race. And he thinks his phrenology consists of *true* judgements so is not racist.
@RottenInDenmark @deonteleologist My Beloved Conservative Relative who believed all the Obama conspiracy theories couldn’t understand why his liberal friends considered him racist. He was really hurt and puzzled by that.
Not a surprise: My congressman has come to the defense of crypto scammers and declined to respond to press inquiries. https://t.co/sTFHxHFtAj
In a world much like our own, HUC’s Cincinnati campus prospers due to its good rail connections to nearby Philadelphia and Baltimore. https://t.co/4J0Wd082d1

@azforeman I have always wondered why Amtrak doesn’t have a Saint Louis stop between DC and Norfolk.
@azforeman Also, I like how the Mediterranean tunnel departs from Jerusalem, where lesser engineers might have chosen Tel Aviv.
Three miles from the house where my mother grew up. https://t.co/DLEaqmaxIy
A really important point at the present moment. https://t.co/KJcHNE1PmQ
If you had told my 12 year old self that somewhere there was a 3 year old who would grow up to play Captain Pike, my mind would have been totally blown. https://t.co/Sh6XrYOLPy
Really, the one simple trick that makes for non-hurried seders. https://t.co/brbePL0zpM
@MisfitTorah That’s why they preemptively invested in calling her dumb. Because she might convince their followers that they’re being played for suckers.
